feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Re-enable SQS (when flag set) in development/self host by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14141
  • When return all table rows is selected the is in filter returns nothing instead of all rows by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.17...2.29.18

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix a flake in the redis.spec.ts file. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14142
  • Fix fun flake in MySQL / MariaDB. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14143
  • Re-sync SQS definitions consistently by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14144
  • Fix a very rare flake in row.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14150
  • Return 401 instead of 403 by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14133

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.18...2.29.19

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Unify duplicated newid utils by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14151
  • Default table - in-memory/on-disk representation duplicates by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14157

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.19...2.29.20

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix for App title text alignment not persisting by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14174
  • Add the option to use bindings in your confirmations actions by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14138
  • Less/Greater than or equal to search test cases by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14162
  • Script to verify ethereal by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14037
  • Row action CRUD endpoints by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14152
  • Prevent duplicated names on row actions by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14190
  • Move automation code away from controller by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14191
  • Automation trigger filtering by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14123

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.20...2.29.21

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Bug Preventing Deleting Multiple Apps in a Row by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14196
  • Support space as last char in column name in SQS by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14193

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.21...2.29.22
